description: The astilbe 'Verscarmine' YOUNIQUE CARMINE is a stunningly unique plant species! Its long, lance-shaped foliage is a deep shade of purple that brightly contrasts with the peachy-pink flower plumes that arise throughout the summer. Its vibrant colors will add drama and a touch of romance to any garden. It also has a long blooming season, adding to its appeal. Plus, its low upkeep and maintenance needs make it even more enticing, as it requires very little pruning and can survive in a variety of conditions. The astilbe 'Verscarmine' YOUNIQUE CARMINE is a delightful addition to any garden and will surely make an eye-catching centerpiece.
